broad.core.parser
Class ConfigFileParser.BasicOptions

java.lang.Object
  broad.core.parser.ConfigFileParser.BasicOptions
Enclosing class:
ConfigFileParser
public static class ConfigFileParser.BasicOptions
extends java.lang.Object

This is a helper class that maps the values of species-specific basic options to their value

Author:
skadri
